backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining storage, access control, user data, posts, ponds, ribbits, tags, and activity tracking types and maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI hover fixes and affected frontend component files with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Textfile containing prewritten summaries of many frontend React components and pages.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app via root div and main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, wraps app in theme provider, and defines main application routing tree.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button component using useBookmarks hook with customizable colors.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a comment item component.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty file placeholder for emoji reactions component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution including heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with search UI, logo behavior, user avatar, create menu, and mobile search modal.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout with header, footer, and mobile sidebar drawer that closes on route change.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Sidebar component rendering navigation links and recent activity with route-aware highlighting.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a lily post card with avatar, metadata, image, and like/share interactions.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Renders images with a blurred backdrop for non‑4:3 ratios and standard display for 4:3 images.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile drawer wrapper for the left sidebar with scroll locking and animated slide-in.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows pond details, moderators, stats, and join/leave controls with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile pond header displaying banner, profile image, and tab navigation for feed/about.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Displays a user's ribbit with avatar, timestamp, linked lily title, and conversation link.
Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Displays a ribbit with avatar, timestamp, likes, and reply form, handling like/unlike and reply creation via query hooks.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Renders an avatar image with a blurred placeholder that transitions to the final image once loaded.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Shows trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts using data from query hooks with skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Full‑screen mobile search modal showing trending searches and suggestions with input handling and selection callbacks.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Dropdown search panel showing trending searches or suggestions based on the current query.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Displays top, trending, and newest tags with activity stats using reusable tag stats modules.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrapper components for tab lists and tab triggers with underline styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Provides bookmark state synced to localStorage with helpers to add, remove, toggle, and clear lily IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value that updates after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity loading via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a given CSS media query matches and updates reactively.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating pond, user, post, and activity data via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and theme variables, including light/dark themes and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into compact strings like 1.2k or 3.4M.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Validates, resizes, and compresses images client‑side, including GIF detection and canvas-based optimization.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Provides helpers to validate and normalize pond names to strict alphanumeric rules.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link using Web Share API with clipboard and fallback support.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes tags to lowercase alphanumeric form with optional empty values.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Handles user identity and Froggy Phrase storage in localStorage, including username generation, settings backup, and recovery.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per-post cooldown tracking for view counts using timestamps stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with platform description, features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays a list of all ponds with join status, loading states, and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Provides a form to create new lilies with text, image, or link types, tag suggestions, and validation.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Provides a form to create new ponds with validation and optional banner/profile image upload and compression.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user's profile with avatar, post and comment counts, and tabs for posts and comments using multiple data-fetching hooks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the main feed of lilies with trending/new sorting, search handling, and sidebars with skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Renders a single lily with comments, likes, view tracking, posting ribbits, image lightbox, and sorting for comments.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows detailed information about a pond including moderators, visibility, creation date, and membership controls.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Displays a pond's feed with join controls, sorting, sidebars, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Lists locally bookmarked lilies with loading/error handling and removal controls.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Renders the tag hub with tabs for top, trending, and newest tags, fetching tag stats and listing them with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays posts associated with a specific tag, handles canonical tag redirects, and supports sorting options with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings including username changes, avatar upload, profile editing, pond management, and admin tools with extensive form and query logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme settings, color tokens, animations, and plugins for styling across the app.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, known issues, and feature requests related to fixing hover backgrounds and rounding sidebar hover highlights.
